description.value:
You conjure a visage that closely resembles a personification of the Bastion's Shield. Through withstanding suffering, you can respond back twicefold.

Visage of the Bastion's Shield Speed 80 feet, fly 80 feet Arrive Withstand Suffering The visage creates a 30 foot emanation around them in an arcane barrier. All allies within this visage gain resistance to all damage equal to 5 plus twice the spell's rank. Any time you or your allies reduce damage through the resistance, make note of it as the pain endured gathers unto the Visage.

Depart Revenge Twicefold The Visage's shield breaks violently, inflicting the suffering back against their afflictors. Enemy creatures within a 30-foot emanation take damage equal to the number of times an ally's damage taken was reduced by this spell's resistance (up to a maximum of 5) multiplied by the resistance's value with a basic Fortitude save.

duration.value: until the end of your next turn
